item.title: The Joy of Service
item.description:
The Joy of Service by Elder Russell C. Taylor, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 154th Semiannual General Conference on Sun Sep 30 1984
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.

item.title: Making Points for Righteousness
item.description:
Making Points for Righteousness by Elder Russell C. Taylor, Of the Second Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Evening of 159th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1989
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
